verses.verse: These are the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and the ordinances <S%H4941><s%> which ye shall observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of thy fathers <S%H1><s%>, hath given <S%H5414><s%> thee to possess <S%H3423><s%> it <S%H3117><s%>, all the days that ye live <S%H2416><s%> upon the earth <S%H127><s%>.

Ye shall surely <S%H6><s%> destroy <S%H6><s%> all the places <S%H4725><s%> wherein the nations <S%H1471><s%> that <S%H834><s%> ye shall dispossess <S%H3423><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> their gods <S%H430><s%>, upon the high <S%H7311><s%> mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and upon the hills <S%H1389><s%>, and under every green <S%H7488><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%>:

and ye shall break <S%H7665><s%> down their altars <S%H4196><s%>, and dash <S%H7665><s%> in pieces their pillars <S%H4676><s%>, and burn <S%H8313><s%> their Asherim <S%H842><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>; and ye shall hew down <S%H1438><s%> the graven images <S%H6456><s%> of their gods <S%H430><s%>; and ye shall destroy <S%H6><s%> their name <S%H8034><s%> out of that place <S%H4725><s%>.
Ye shall not do so <S%H6213><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.

But unto the place <S%H4725><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%> out of all your tribes <S%H7626><s%>, to put <S%H7760><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> there <S%H7933><s%>, even unto his habitation shall ye seek <S%H1875><s%>, and thither thou shalt come <S%H935><s%>;

and thither ye shall bring <S%H935><s%> your burnt-offerings <S%H5930><s%>, and your sacrifices <S%H2077><s%>, and your tithes <S%H4643><s%>, and the heave-offering <S%H8641><s%> of your hand <S%H3027><s%>, and your vows <S%H5088><s%>, and your freewill-offerings <S%H5071><s%>, and the firstlings <S%H1062><s%> of your herd <S%H1241><s%> and of your flock <S%H6629><s%>:

and there ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and ye shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in all that ye put <S%H4916><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> unto <S%H1004><s%>, ye and your households, wherein Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath blessed thee <S%H1288><s%>.
Ye shall not do <S%H6213><s%> after all the things that we do <S%H6213><s%> here this day <S%H3117><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> whatsoever is right <S%H3477><s%> in his own eyes <S%H5869><s%>;
for ye are not as yet come <S%H935><s%> to the rest <S%H4496><s%> and to the inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth thee <S%H5414><s%>.

But when ye go over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, and dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> causeth you to inherit <S%H5157><s%>, and he giveth you rest <S%H5117><s%> from all your enemies <S%H341><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, so that ye dwell <S%H3427><s%> in safety <S%H983><s%>;

then it shall come to pass that to the place <S%H4725><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%>, to cause his name <S%H8034><s%> to dwell <S%H7931><s%> there <S%H935><s%>, thither shall ye bring all that I command <S%H6680><s%> you <S%H5930><s%>: your burnt-offerings, and your sacrifices <S%H2077><s%>, your tithes <S%H4643><s%>, and the heave-offering <S%H8641><s%> of your hand <S%H3027><s%>, and all your choice <S%H4005><s%> vows <S%H5088><s%> which ye vow <S%H5087><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And ye shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, ye <S%H1121><s%>, and your sons, and your daughters <S%H1323><s%>, and your men-servants <S%H5650><s%>, and your maid-servants <S%H519><s%>, and the Levite <S%H3881><s%> that is within your gates <S%H8179><s%>, forasmuch <S%H3588><s%> as he hath no portion <S%H2506><s%> nor inheritance with you <S%H5159><s%>.
Take heed <S%H8104><s%> to thyself that thou offer <S%H5927><s%> not thy burnt-offerings <S%H5930><s%> in every place <S%H4725><s%> that thou seest <S%H7200><s%>;

but in the place <S%H4725><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> of thy tribes <S%H7626><s%>, there thou shalt offer <S%H5927><s%> thy burnt-offerings <S%H5930><s%>, and there thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> all that I command thee <S%H6680><s%>.

Notwithstanding <S%H2076><s%>, thou mayest kill and eat <S%H398><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> within all thy gates <S%H8179><s%>, after <S%H185><s%> all the desire <S%H185><s%> of thy soul <S%H5315><s%>, according to the blessing <S%H1293><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> which he hath given <S%H5414><s%> thee <S%H2931><s%>: the unclean and the clean <S%H2889><s%> may eat <S%H398><s%> thereof <S%H354><s%>, as of the gazelle, and as of the hart.
Only ye shall not eat <S%H398><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%>; thou shalt pour <S%H8210><s%> it out upon the earth <S%H776><s%> as water <S%H4325><s%>.

Thou mayest <S%H3201><s%> not eat <S%H398><s%> within thy gates <S%H8179><s%> the tithe <S%H4643><s%> of thy grain <S%H1715><s%>, or of thy new wine <S%H8492><s%>, or of thine oil <S%H3323><s%>, or the firstlings <S%H1062><s%> of thy herd <S%H1241><s%> or of thy flock <S%H6629><s%>, nor any of thy vows <S%H5088><s%> which thou vowest <S%H5087><s%>, nor thy freewill-offerings <S%H5071><s%>, nor the heave-offering <S%H8641><s%> of thy hand <S%H3027><s%>;

but thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%>, thou <S%H1121><s%>, and thy son, and thy daughter <S%H1323><s%>, and thy man-servant <S%H5650><s%>, and thy maid-servant <S%H519><s%>, and the Levite <S%H3881><s%> that is within thy gates <S%H8179><s%>: and thou shalt rejoice <S%H8055><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> in all that thou puttest <S%H4916><s%> thy hand unto <S%H3027><s%>.
Take heed <S%H8104><s%> to thyself that thou forsake <S%H5800><s%> not the Levite <S%H3881><s%> as long as thou livest <S%H3117><s%> in thy land <S%H127><s%>.

When Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall enlarge <S%H7337><s%> thy border <S%H1366><s%>, as he hath promised <S%H1696><s%> thee <S%H559><s%>, and thou shalt say, I will eat <S%H398><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%>, because thy soul <S%H5315><s%> desireth to eat <S%H398><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%>; thou mayest eat <S%H398><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%>, after <S%H185><s%> all the desire <S%H185><s%> of thy soul <S%H5315><s%>.

If the place <S%H4725><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%>, to put <S%H7760><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> there <S%H7368><s%>, be too far from thee <S%H2076><s%>, then thou shalt kill of thy herd <S%H1241><s%> and of thy flock <S%H6629><s%>, which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> thee <S%H6680><s%>, as I have commanded thee <S%H398><s%>; and thou mayest eat within thy gates <S%H8179><s%>, after <S%H185><s%> all the desire of thy soul <S%H5315><s%>.

Even as the gazelle <S%H6643><s%> and as the hart <S%H354><s%> is eaten <S%H398><s%>, so thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> thereof <S%H2931><s%>: the unclean and the clean <S%H2889><s%> may eat <S%H398><s%> thereof alike <S%H3162><s%>.

Only be sure <S%H2388><s%> that thou eat <S%H398><s%> not the blood <S%H1818><s%>: for the blood <S%H1818><s%> is the life <S%H5315><s%>; and thou shalt not eat <S%H398><s%> the life <S%H5315><s%> with the flesh <S%H1320><s%>.
Thou shalt not eat <S%H398><s%> it <S%H8210><s%>; thou shalt pour it out upon the earth <S%H776><s%> as water <S%H4325><s%>.

Thou shalt not eat <S%H398><s%> it <S%H3190><s%>; that it may go well with thee <S%H1121><s%>, and with thy children after <S%H310><s%> thee <S%H6213><s%>, when thou shalt do that which is right <S%H3477><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Only thy holy things <S%H6944><s%> which thou hast <S%H5088><s%>, and thy vows, thou shalt take <S%H5375><s%>, and go <S%H935><s%> unto the place <S%H4725><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%>:

and thou shalt offer <S%H6213><s%> thy burnt-offerings <S%H5930><s%>, the flesh <S%H1320><s%> and the blood <S%H1818><s%>, upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>; and the blood <S%H1818><s%> of thy sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> shall be poured out <S%H8210><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>; and thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%>.

Observe <S%H8104><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> all these words <S%H1697><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> thee <S%H3190><s%>, that it may go well with thee <S%H1121><s%>, and with thy children after <S%H310><s%> thee for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>, when thou doest <S%H6213><s%> that which is good <S%H2896><s%> and right <S%H3477><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>.

When Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall cut off <S%H3772><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> thee <S%H935><s%>, whither thou goest in to dispossess <S%H3423><s%> them <S%H3423><s%>, and thou dispossessest them <S%H3427><s%>, and dwellest in their land <S%H776><s%>;

take heed <S%H8104><s%> to thyself that thou be not ensnared <S%H5367><s%> to follow <S%H310><s%> them <S%H310><s%>, after that they are destroyed <S%H8045><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> thee <S%H1875><s%>; and that thou inquire not after their gods <S%H430><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, How do these nations <S%H1471><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> their gods <S%H430><s%>? even so will I do <S%H6213><s%> likewise <S%H1571><s%>.

Thou shalt not do <S%H6213><s%> so unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>: for every abomination <S%H8441><s%> to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, which he hateth <S%H8130><s%>, have they done <S%H6213><s%> unto their gods <S%H430><s%>; for even their sons <S%H1121><s%> and their daughters <S%H1323><s%> do they burn <S%H8313><s%> in the fire <S%H784><s%> to their gods <S%H430><s%>.
What thing <S%H1697><s%> soever I command <S%H6680><s%> you <S%H8104><s%>, that shall ye observe to do <S%H6213><s%>: thou shalt not add <S%H3254><s%> thereto <S%H1639><s%>, nor diminish from it.
